title: Posters criticising PM Modi appear as he arrives in Hyderabad
comments: After every visit to any southern state, Muddi would need to see the psychotherapist.
Isn't even much news. They do it every time Modiji lands. I think this time BJP have put up counter posters as well. The games are ramping up.
They will massage his ego by doing some flower shower on him on his return. JP Nadda's main KRA is keeping Modis ego happy.
Or do another event with lots od photographers
Hate emboldens them more as they think they're better than the rest.
